title: Sitz Bath Salt USA Produced Natural Hemorrhoid Treatment and Postpartum Care - Organic Sitz Bath Soak Dead Sea Salt, Epsom Salt, Witch Hazel, Frankincense, Essential Oils Hemmoroid Treatment 32oz
features: LARGE 32 OZ POUCH FOR TWICE AS MANY BATHS AS OTHER SOAKS: Enjoy more relaxing, relieving, soothing (and economical!) sitz baths in the comfort of your home.
PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA: 100% Natural and organic ingredients (NO PARABENS!) Cruelty free.Fast, Effective Post-Surgical & After-Birth Pain Relief Soak
DEVELOPED BY AN OB/GYN & PRIMARY CARE PHYSICIAN: Midwifery approved, and highly recommended by new Moms.

EASY TO USE: Sprinkle the soak into warm water using the included wooden scoop. Use in a sitz bath over the toilet, in a shallow hip bath, or mix with water in a spray bottle for either portable cleansing, or as a soothing spray for postpartum pads, or on-the-go pain relief
NEW MOMS AND POST SURGERY: The gorgeous package and included wooden scoop make this a thoughtful item for new moms (great for baby showers!) or those recovering from surgery.
description: At Purasoothe, we believe in safe, natural and easy solutions for difficulties during and after pregnancy, and due to surgery or other medical problems.
